Valla.name: Hungering Arrow
Valla.description: Fire an arrow that deals 140 (+4% per level) damage to the first target hit, then seeks up to 2 additional enemies, prioritizing Heroes, dealing 80 (+4% per level) damage. Can hit an enemy multiple times.

Valla.name: Multishot
Valla.description: Deal 165 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within the target area.

Valla.name: Vault
Valla.description: Dash to the target area. Valla's next Basic Attack within 2 seconds deals 6% increased damage per stack of Hatred.

Valla.name: Strafe
Valla.description: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 60 (+4% per level) damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

Valla.name: Rain of Vengeance
Valla.description: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 250 (+4% per level) damage and Stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds.  Stores up to 2 charges.

Valla.name: Hatred
Valla.description: Basic Attacks grant a stack of Hatred, up to 10. Each Hatred stack increases Basic Attack damage by 8% and Movement Speed by 1%. Lasts 6 seconds.

1.name: Puncturing Arrow
1.description: Increase the number of Hungering Arrow bounces by 1.  Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Hungering Arrow refunds 40 Mana and permanently increases the damage of its initial impact by 6.

1.name: Fire At Will
1.description: Quest: Hitting a Hero with Multishot grants 2 Hatred and permanently increases its damage by 4.

1.name: Creed of the Hunter
1.description: Loan: Gain 20% bonus Attack Speed. Every death reduces this bonus by 5%.  Quest: Every 50 Basic Attacks against Heroes increases Hatred's damage bonus per stack by 1%, up to 5%.

4.name: Arsenal
4.description: Increase the range of Multishot by 20%. Multishot also fires 3 grenades that deal 120 (+4% per level) damage and refund 25 Mana after hitting enemy Heroes.

4.name: Death Dealer
4.description: Increase Vaults Basic Attack damage bonus from 6% to 15% per stack of Hatred. If this attack kills its victim within 1.5 seconds, the Mana cost and cooldown of Vault are refunded.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Vault by 5 seconds.

4.name: Repeating Arrow
4.description: Vault no longer has a Mana cost. Casting Vault resets the cooldown of Hungering Arrow.

7.name: Monster Hunter
7.description: Hungering Arrow deals 150% additional damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

7.name: Frost Shot
7.description: Multishot Slows enemies by 20% for 2.5 seconds. Hungering Arrows deals 25% more damage to Slowed enemies.

7.name: Hot Pursuit
7.description: Increase the Movement Speed bonus of each stack of Hatred to 2.5%.

10.name: Strafe
10.description: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 60 (+4% per level) damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

10.name: Rain of Vengeance
10.description: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 250 (+4% per level) damage and Stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds.  Stores up to 2 charges.

13.name: Siphoning Arrows
13.description: Hitting a Hero with Hungering Arrow heals Valla for 4% of her maximum Health, and Multishot heals for 2%.

13.name: Tempered by Discipline
13.description: Basic Attacks heal for 10% of the damage dealt, increased by 2% per Hatred stack.

13.name: Gloom
13.description: Activate to consume all Hatred, granting 3 Spell Armor per Hatred consumed for 5 seconds.  Passive: Gain 20 Spell Armor, and each stack of Hatred heals for 2.5 Health per second.

16.name: Punishment
16.description: While at max Hatred, Multishot's cooldown recharges 50% faster.

16.name: Seething Hatred
16.description: While at max Hatred, increase all damage dealt by 10%.

16.name: Manticore
16.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same Hero deals an additional 5% of their maximum Health as damage.

20.name: Death Siphon
20.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Strafe increases its duration by 0.125 seconds. Strafe also fires penetrating bolts in a line for 34 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds that heal for 25% of their damage dealt.

20.name: Storm of Vengeance
20.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Rain of Vengeance by 5 seconds.  Passive: Each stack of Hatred increases your Attack Speed by 2%. While at max Hatred, gain an additional 30% Attack Speed.

20.name: Acrobat
20.description: Gain 2 additional charges of Vault. Drop 3 Caltrops while Vaulting that deal 60 (+4% per level) damage and Slow enemies by 40% for 1 second.

20.name: Farflight Quiver
20.description: Gain 20% Basic Attack range. While at max Hatred, gain an additional 30% Basic Attack range.
